game.name: Gas Guzzlers: Combat Carnage
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 스크린 공유 및 분할 PvP, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam Cloud, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Gas Guzzlers: Combat Carnage is a fast-paced addictive combat racing game for the PC. The game features many different vehicles, weapons, upgrades, on-track bonuses as well as distinctive and astonishing environments.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Gas Guzzlers: Combat Carnage is a fast-paced addictive combat racing game for the PC. The game features many different vehicles, weapons, upgrades, on-track bonuses as well as distinctive and astonishing environments.
